moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.effect: Has a small chance of making the target flinch.

moves.name: X Attack All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Attack of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Strike Together!
moves.effect: Raises the Attack and Speed of all allied sync pairs.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Flameproof
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting burned.
